save_category_payments.title: Activation of payment methods by category
save_category_payments.explain: Select the available payment methods for each product category. If none of the checkbox is checked inside a column, it means that all categories are eligible for this payment method.
footer: Some payment methods only can be used to pay some kinds of products (food products, etc). You can enable and disable each payment method for each products' category in order to filter what payment methods are available for each product's type.
If a cart contains both eligible and non-eligible products for the payment method chosen by a customer, an another payment method will be used to pay non-eligible amount part.

errors.display_form: An error occurred while building category payments form.

save_shipping_payments.title: Management of delivery costs by means of payment
save_shipping_payments.explain: Some payment methods don't legally allow to pay shipping costs. You can select the payment methods which don't allow to pay these shipping costs. If a customer chooses one of theses payment methods, he will pay his shipping costs with an another payment method.

form.label: Payment methods not compatible with shipping costs

errors.display_form: An error occurred while building shipping payments form.
